idea-plugin.name: Base16 Shades of Purple
idea-plugin.vendor: Iolar Demartini Junior (http://github.com/demartini) based on Shades of Purple Theme (https://github.com/ahmadawais/shades-of-purple-vscode)., Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Shades of Purple for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Iolar Demartini Junior (http://github.com/demartini) based on Shades of Purple Theme (https://github.com/ahmadawais/shades-of-purple-vscode).. Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
